Another classic yet homely dish - easy cook fried eggplants with pork! The eggplants and minced meat are braised in a combination of spicy bean paste and soy sauce. It then absorbs all the umami like a sponge. Deep frying the eggplants give them the texture of a grilled eggplants!

Also, don't underestimate the salted fish, as it adds another layer of aroma to the dish. 

Remember to cook more white rice with this for a perfect match!

#themeatmensg #zichar #eggplant #pork #saltedfish #comfortfood

â¬‡ï¸ Ingredients here â¬‡ï¸
3 medium eggplants
150g minced pork
50g salted fish in oil (cut into cubes)
Oil for frying
1 tbsp minced garlic
1 tbsp minced ginger
30g chopped spring onions
3 tbsp cornstarch solution (1 tbsp cornstarch mixed with 2 tbsp sugar)

Sauce:
2 tbsp light soy sauce
1/4 cup water
2 tbsp spicy bean paste (adjust to preference)
2 tbsp black vinegar
1Â½ tbsp sugar
1 tbsp hua tiao wine
